tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_worker_training_programs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    training_program VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    certification VARCHAR(50),
    skill_level ENUM('Beginner', 'Intermediate', 'Advanced')
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_worker (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
profession VARCHAR(50),
certification_level INT);

CREATE TABLE training_program (program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
program_name VARCHAR(50),
program_description TEXT,
duration_in_weeks INT);

CREATE TABLE certification (cerf_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
certification_name VARCHAR(50),
organization VARCHAR(50),
validity_period_in_years INT);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_worker (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(100),
    certification_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE training_program (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    duration INT,
    training_provider VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE worker_certification (
    worker_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (worker_id, certification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (worker_id) REFERENCES healthcare_worker(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certification(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE worker_training (
    worker_id INT,
    program_id INT,
    module_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (worker_id) REFERENCES healthcare_workers(worker_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES training_programs(program_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (module_id) REFERENCES program_modules(module_id)
);
